summary: The series Ecosystem Architecture explores internet fragmentation through analogies like tectonic shifts and continental drift. It highlights how fragmented digital systems can lead to innovative, sustainable ecosystems by integrating interdisciplinary ideas from philosophy to coding. The series critiques the notion of a unified internet, emphasizing realistic assessments and inclusive efforts by organizations like the Internet Society.
excerpt: The series Ecosystem Architecture explores how fragmented digital systems can lead to innovative, sustainable ecosystems. It critiques the notion of a unified internet and highlights inclusivity.
